short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple to-do list for managing tasks over three days

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily manage your tasks for the next three days! This Chrome extension is a simple to-do list focused on organizing only today’s, tomorrow’s, and the day after tomorrow’s tasks. With an intuitive interface, anyone can use it effortlessly, allowing you to quickly add and review essential tasks without unnecessary features.

Just click the icon at the top of your browser to access your to-do list—no need to open a complicated app or website. At the end of each day, today’s tasks are automatically cleared, and you can add new ones for the upcoming days, making daily planning efficient and straightforward.

This extension is perfect for those who want to focus only on short-term schedules or set manageable, short-term goals without feeling overwhelmed. Manage your tasks quickly and easily each day, and boost your productivity!
